quote: Dreams are the guiding stars to your destiny.
author: Unknown

quote: Dare to dream, and then dare to do.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream with your eyes wide open.
author: Jason Silva

quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Dream big. Start small. Act now.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Dreams don't work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Dreams aren't what you leave behind when morning comes. They are the stuff that fill your every living moment.
author: David Cuschieri

quote: Dream big. The sky is the limit.
author: Unknown

quote: Dreams are illustrations... from the book your soul is writing about you.
author: Marsha Norman

quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
author: Edgar Cayce

quote: Success is a dream made real through hard work.
author: Unknown

quote: Dreams are not what you see in sleep, they are the things that don't let you sleep.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Sometimes dreams are wiser than waking.
author: Black Elk

quote: Chase the vision, not the money, the money will end up following you.
author: Tony Hsieh

quote: Dream like a child. Act like a warrior.
author: Unknown

quote: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself.
author: Gail Devers

quote: You must go after your wish. As soon as you start to pursue a dream, your life wakes up.
author: Barbara Sher

quote: The more you dream, the farther you fly.
author: Unknown

quote: The bigger the dream, the more important the team.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: You were born with the ability to change someone's life - don't ever waste it.
author: Dale Partridge

quote: Every dreamer is bound to make it big one day.
author: Unknown

quote: Wake up with determination, go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown

quote: If you don't build your dream, someone will hire you to help build theirs.
author: Tony Gaskins

quote: Capture your dreams and your life becomes full. You can, because you think you can.
author: Nikita Koloff

quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Chase your passion, not your pension.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Without dreams, there can be no courage. And without courage, there can be no action.
author: Wim Wenders

quote: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream.
author: Debby Boone

quote: Dreams come true. Without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
author: John Updike

quote: In dreams begins responsibility.
author: W. B. Yeats

quote: Don't let your dreams be dreams.
author: Jack Johnson

quote: Dreams are necessary to life.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
author: Paul Valery

quote: The only limit to the height of your achievements is the reach of your dreams.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom and your dreams into reality.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Make your dream so big that it scares you.
author: Unknown

quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams.
author: Arthur O'Shaughnessy

quote: A single dream is more powerful than a thousand realities.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: No dreamer is ever too small; no dream is ever too big.
author: Unknown

quote: Dreams come a size too big so we can grow into them.
author: Josie Bisset

quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer.
author: Harriet Tubman

quote: Let your dreams be your wings.
author: Unknown

quote: Dare to live the life you've dreamed for yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Don't downgrade your dream just to fit your reality. Upgrade your conviction to match your destiny.
author: Stuart Scott

quote: Dream boldly. Dream wildly. Dream without limits.
author: Unknown

quote: Let your dreams be bigger than your fears.
author: Unknown

quote: Follow your dreams—they know the way.
author: Kobi Yamada

quote: Live your dreams, not your fears.
author: Unknown

quote: Dreams are the blueprints of your soul's purpose.
author: Unknown

quote: Every morning you have two choices: continue to sleep with your dreams, or wake up and chase them.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Dreams can often become challenging, but challenges are what we live for.
author: Travis White

quote: Success is a journey fueled by dreams.
author: Unknown

quote: Follow your dreams, they know the way.
author: Kobi Yamada

quote: Dreams are free. So free your dreams.
author: Astrid Alauda

quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Keep dreaming. It's how you make your soul grow.
author: Unknown

quote: Dreams are renewable. No matter what our age or condition, there are still untapped possibilities within us.
author: David Viscott

quote: Dreams make things happen, nothing is impossible as long as you believe.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Unknown

quote: A dream is a wish your heart makes.
author: Cinderella

quote: Believe in your dreams and they may come true; believe in yourself and they will come true.
author: Unknown

quote: Chase your dreams until you catch them...and then dream, catch, and dream again!
author: Dee Marie

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Dreams are made to be chased and caught.
author: Unknown

quote: Dreaming permits each and every one of us to be quietly and safely insane every night of our lives.
author: William Dement

quote: Dreams are extremely important. You can't do it unless you imagine it.
author: George Lucas

quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Success comes to those who dare to dream.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: Your dreams don't have to be lofty; they just have to be lived.
author: Kelly Bouchard

quote: Dreams say what they mean, but they don't say it in daytime language.
author: Gail Godwin

quote: Success is not for the chosen few, but for the few who choose it.
author: Unknown

quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Dreams aren't made to be hidden in your pillow.
author: Unknown

quote: There's no limit to what you can dream, and no limit to what you can achieve.
author: Unknown

quote: Your dreams are a poetic reflection of your soul.
author: Unknown

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Dreaming isn't just for the night—it's for every second you live.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't just chase your dreams, catch them.
author: Unknown

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: Every dream starts with a spark.
author: Unknown
